typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EDLPExtractId as string,
		AccessMode as string,
		AccessModeCode as integer,
		AccessModeSeqNo as long,
		Address1_AddressId as string,
		Address1_City as string,
		Address1_Country as string,
		Address1_Fax as string,
		Address1_Line1 as string,
		Address1_Line2 as string,
		Address1_Line3 as string,
		Address1_PostalCode as string,
		Address1_StateOrProvince as string,
		Address1_Telephone1 as string,
		Address1_Telephone3 as string,
		BusinessUnitId as string,
		CalType as string,
		CalTypeCode as integer,
		CalTypeSeqNo as long,
		CreatedById as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		CrmInstanceId as string,
		DefaultMailbox as string,
		DomainName as string,
		DPNSignDate as timestamp,
		dsraction as string,
		dsrdate as timestamp,
		dsrticket as string,
		FirstName as string,
		HomePhone as string,
		InternalEmailAddress as string,
		InviteStatus as string,
		InviteStatusCode as integer,
		InviteStatusSeqNo as long,
		IsDisabled as boolean,
		IsNotificationSent as string,
		IsNotificationSentCode as integer,
		IsNotificationSentSeqNo as long,
		LastName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		MobileAlertEmail as string,
		MobilePhone as string,
		ModifiedById as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		OdsCreatedDate as timestamp,
		OdsModifiedDate as timestamp,
		OdsStatus as integer,
		ParentSystemUserId as string,
		PersonalEmailAddress as string,
		PreferredAddress as string,
		PreferredAddressCode as integer,
		PreferredAddressSeqNo as long,
		PreferredPhone as string,
		PreferredPhoneCode as integer,
		PreferredPhoneSeqNo as long,
		QueueId as string,
		Role as string,
		RoleCode as integer,
		RoleSeqNo as long,
		SiteId as string,
		SystemUserId as string,
		TenantId as integer,
		TerritoryId as string,
		Title as string,
		VersionNumber as long,
		WindowsLiveId as string,
		areaname as string,
		discipline as string,
		GTMPosition as string,
		industry as string,
		org as string,
		orgdetail as string,
		orgsummary as string,
		profession as string,
		qualifier1 as string,
		qualifier2 as string,
		regionname as string,
		rolegroup as string,
		roleidentity as string,
		RoleSummary as string,
		salesdistrictname as string,
		saleslocationname as string,
		solutionarea as string,
		subregionname as string,
		systemusertype as string,
		EDLPExtractDateTime as timestamp,
		EDLPLoadTS as string,
		EDLPModifiedDateTime as timestamp,
		EDLPDeltaActionCode as string,
		ExtractId as string,
		ExtractDateTime as timestamp,
		LoadTS as timestamp,
		DeltaActionCode as string,
		PlatformCreatedDate as timestamp,
		PlatformModifiedDate as timestamp,
		PlatformModifiedDateAsInt as long,
		azureactivedirectoryobjectid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'cseo',
	folderPath: 'standardized/masterandreference/msx/hub_vw_systemuser/v1/sensitive') ~> MSXsystemuser
MSXsystemuser filter(lower(qualifier1) =="global black belt" || lower(qualifier2) =="global black belt") ~> filter1
filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> GBBuser
